name: Email Sync
author: Dev7studios

sections.description:
Do you run an ecommerce or membership site with WordPress? Ever wished your registered users in WordPress could be synced with your favorite newsletter software?

The Email Sync WordPress plugin allows you to do this with unparalleled ease. Simply enter your email provider details and Email Sync will automatically keep your WordPress user’s email addresses in sync. When users are registered Email Sync will subscribe the email address to your email provider. When a user is deleted Email Sync will unsubscribe the email address. When a users updates their email address Email Sync will update the email address in your email provider. You get the idea.

Email Sync also adds an option in the user profile settings to allow users (and admins) to easily change their subscription status from their profile settings page.

Current Providers:

  • Mailchimp
sections.installation:
1. Install this plugin using WordPress’ built-in installer
  2. Access Settings > Email Sync and configure

short_description: Sync your WordPress email addresses with your favorite email marketing software.
